data.name: Alpha Hole Prison - Rin-Timber's Perspective
data.detailed_description:
What's the deal with Rin-Timber? What is this cunning character really up to? This bonus DLC will take us into the mind of Rin-Timber and let us see what this sneaky fellow is thinking. Add this to your Alpha Hole Prison game for free! Click 'Bonus Content' on the main menu to find this free DLC.

Press 'v' on your keyboard to have all text read aloud.
data.about_the_game:

Press 'v' on your keyboard to have all text read aloud.

fullgame.name: Alpha Hole Prison - A Yaoi, Gay, Bara Visual Novel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
